Class PatientView

java.lang.Object
view.PatientView
public class PatientView extends Object
The PatientView class is responsible for handling the patient's view of the Hospital Management System. It provides a menu for patients to interact with their medical records, appointments, and personal information. Author: Jun hoa Version: 1.0 Since: 16/11/2024

  • Constructor Details

    • PatientView

      public PatientView(Patient patient, Scanner scanner, MedicalRecordController medicalRecordController)
      Constructs a PatientView instance with the specified patient, scanner, and medical record controller.
      Parameters:
      patient - The Patient object representing the logged-in patient.
      scanner - The Scanner object used to read user input.
      medicalRecordController - The MedicalRecordController object used to manage medical records.

  • Method Details

    • showMenu

      public void showMenu()
      Displays the patient menu and handles user input for various patient-related actions.

    • viewPersonalInformation

      private void viewPersonalInformation()
